channel.title: I need some help
channel.description: i cant hook up no-ip with my server without ham can some one give me some steps to hooking it up like what do u use do u use like the ip they give u or ur ham ip or ur eathier net ip or what can some one give me some steps[br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2007, 08:25:35 AM[/size][hr]and allso how do u add a monster to respawn there int eh one spot and change the drop things of the monster

item.title: I need some help
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

ok first off… NO DOUBLE POST =P kk. second off. when your on no-ip.com theres a ip up and the top left of the page. thats the ip you use. and if your using ham there are some ham server guides. for the monster drop i used the npcspawn. and then added to npcdrop…yup! thats what i did…and it worked…i think.
